name: Rat Swarm
actives: **Bites and Scratches** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: the target takes 2d4 damage. Bonus: +1d4 damage. Downside: -1d4 damage.
passives:
**Eaten to Bones** - When the Rats move onto a dead non-Construct creature it may consume the dead creature till its nothing but bones regaining 3d4 health.

**Swarm** - The Bird Swarm can occupy another creature's space or vice versa and can't become Grappled. The swarm can move through any opening large enough for its individual birds.
descriptor: A swarm of rats. Usually found in dark dirty areas. They tend to only have one goal of consuming and can be manipulated if given an easy meal.

name: Bird Swarm
actives: **Claw and Peck** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: the target takes 2d4 damage. Bonus: +1d4 damage. Downside: -1d4 damage.
passives:
**Flight** - The Bird Swarm can fly and is unaffected by ground based effects.

**Swarm** - The Bird Swarm can occupy another creature's space or vice versa and can't become Grappled. The swarm can move through any opening large enough for its individual birds.
descriptor: A swarm of birds. Possibly influenced by outside sources or by familial bonds (such as a murder of crows).

name: Scrap-eater Worm
actives:
**Ripping Teeth** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Remove 3 Shielding then do 3 damage. Bonus: Remove 6 Shielding then do 3 damage.

**Acid Spit** Spend ## and 1 Strain; 8 Ranged Attack. On Hit: Give 2 Burn. Bonus: Remove 3 Shielding and give 2 Burn.
passives: **Burrower** - When moving the Scrapeater Worm will dig underground becoming un-targetable.
descriptor: A large burrowing creature often found in junkyards, mines, or abandoned places. Their primary food source is metal and can become quite the pest to metallurgy sites such as forges or mines. These worms can grow to tremendous sizes if given enough food and are often considered a pest in most places.

name: Trained Dog (Armored)
actives:
**Bite** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Give the target Slow until the start of the Dog's next turn.

**Track Creature** - Spend 1 minute; For up to an hour The Dog Focuses on following the path of a creature which they have named or have evidence of. If the creature is within 1 large tile (2,160 tiles) of the Dog a path will appear up to 4 tiles in front of them, moving as they move.
passives: **Good Smell** - The Dog gains +1d4 when doing Senses rolls based on smell.
descriptor: A good doggy trained to follow commands. Can be found with guards or in kennels.

name: Silver Wolf
actives:
**Bite** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: Give the target Slow until the start of the Dog's next turn.

**Mark** - Spend #; Give a target the Wolf can see Marked until the start of the Wolf's next turn.

**Track Creature** - Spend 1 minute; For up to an hour The Wolf Focuses on following the path of a creature which they have named or have evidence of. If the creature is within 1 large tile (2,160 tiles) of the Wolf a path will appear up to 4 tiles in front of them, moving as they move.
passives: **Good Smell** - The Dog gains +1d4 when doing Senses rolls based on smell.
descriptor: Larger than your average wolf. These wolves are highly territorial and will attack almost anything they deem a threat on sight. However, the northern clans have been known to tame and bring these wolfs into battle.

name: molefrog
actives:
**Lick** - Spend ##; 2 Reaching Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Pull the target 1 tile closer.

**Leap** - Spend # and 1 Strain; The Molefrog jumps up to 12 tiles away.
passives:
**Burrower** - When moving the Molefrog will dig underground becoming un-targetable.

**Amphibious** - The Molefrog can swim, and hold its breath for up to 1 hour.
descriptor: Found in floodplains. These creatures tend to breed in the wet season and burrow in the dry season. Some farmers find these creatures to be pests and others keep them as pets to help turn the soil and eat insects.

name: Bear
actives:
**Claws** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 3 Damage. Bonus: Remove 3 Armor then do 3 Damage.

**Bite** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 5 Damage. Bonus: Gain Empowered.

**Destructive Power** - Spend ## and Empowered; Do a *Bite* then *Claws* Attack with the same dice value.
passives: **Climber** - The Bear can climb.
descriptor: Your average bear.

name: stalacbeetle
actives:
**Slam** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Knockback the target 6 tiles. Bonus: If the target takes knockback damage they gain that much Stun.

**Ram** - Spend ## and 2 Strain; Move the Stalacbeetle's SPEED then do a *Slam* Attack.
passives:
**Rage Targeting** - The Stalacbeetle will target the creature which did the most damage to them before their turn.

**Wall Walker** - Can climb on floors and ceilings as if it was normal ground.
descriptor: An ambush predictor, this beetle clings to the ceilings of caves pretending to be a stalactite. When prey comes close they slam their prey against the wall to stun or kill it.

name: Phoenix
actives:
**Flame Claw** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: give the target 4 Burn. Bonus: +2 Burn.

**Volcano Aura** - Spend # and 3 Strain; Aura. Give 4 Burn and Difficult Terrain.

**Fire Spew** - Spend # and 2 Strain; 12 Ranged Attack. On Hit: Give 3 Burn. Bonus: +2 Burn
passives:
**Flight** - The Bird Swarm can fly and is unaffected by ground based effects.

**Phoenix Resurrection** - When the Phoenix has 0 or less health, they explode into flames dealing 2d4 Burn to everything within 3 tiles then the Phoenix turns into an egg.
descriptor: The token bird of Jena. Powerful, beautiful, and dangerous. They have recently been poached for their healing feathers. Should a Phoenix lose a feather it will never grow back.

name: Cracking Lava Dragon
actives:
**Burning Claws** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Give 3 Burn. Bonus: +2 Burn.

**Harden** - Spend # and 2 Strain; Gain Bonus Shielding equal to twice the dice spent.

**Lava Spill** - Spend ## and 3 Strain; Pick a point within 8 tiles of the Dragon. All tiles within 3 tiles of this point become covered in Lava for 1 minute. Creatures that enter a Lava tile gain 3 Burn.
passives:
**Dragon** - When you Lock a dice turn it into a 6. This creature can also Fly.

**Broken Free** - While the dragon has no Shielding it cannot take damage from Burn and gains +2 Dodge and Speed.
descriptor: A lava elemental in the shape of a dragon. The lava has started to cool only leaving the joints.
how_act: Rage, Burn It All, Seek Heat

name: Decaying Zombie
actives:
**Decaying Claws** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 3 damage, and the target cannot Heal until the start of your next turn. Bonus: Gain +2 damage.

**Lunge** - Spend ## and 1 Strain; Move 3 tiles then do a Decaying Claws Attack.
passives: **Undying Form** - At 0 Health roll 1d6. On a 2 or higher it lives on 1 hp. Increase this difficulty by 1 each time it survives.
descriptor: A dead and decaying reanimated corpse of some creature. They are usually found near older necromantic powers or after said powers have stopped.

name: Fresh Zombie
actives:
**Decaying Claws** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 3 damage, and the target cannot Heal until the start of your next turn. Bonus: Gain +2 damage.

**Lunge** - Spend ## and 1 Strain; Move 3 tiles then do a Decaying Claws Attack.
passives: **Undying Form** - At 0 Health roll 1d6. On a 2 or higher it lives on 1 hp. Increase this difficulty by 1 each time it survives.
descriptor: A Zombie which has yet to start to decay. Usually found in the presence of Necromancers or at the heart of Undead Groves.

name: Puppetmaster Demon
actives:
**Puppet Throw** - Spend ##; Throw any number of puppeted creatures 8 tiles. (This counts as Knockback and can do Knockback damage.)

**Claws** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 3 Damage. Bonus: Remove 3 Armor then do 3 Damage.
passives:
**Puppeteer** - The demon can see through the senses of any puppet they have.

**A Devilish Deal** - The demon is willing to make deals that would help give them more puppets.
descriptor: An eyeless multi-armed obsidian colored demon. Each arm holds a stringed puppet depicting someone they have control over. Growing a new arm to hold any new puppets.

name: Groveling
actives:
**Tendrils** - Spend ##; Reaching 2 Attack. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Root the target.

**Entrench** - Spend # and 1 Strain; Root the Groveling then gain spent dice Shielding. (Remember the )
passives:
**Flame Weakness** - When the Groveling gains Burn gain twice the amount.

**Nutrients** - While the Groveling is Rooted or Slowed it heals 1 Health at the end of its turn. If it is on a dead creature it heals 3 instead.
descriptor: A small plant/myconid creature which can be found plentifully inside Groves. While slow they can be dangerous in numbers, and tend to pretend to be other plant/mushrooms before striking.

name: Mossy Choker
actives: **Pounce** - Spend ##; Jump the Mossy Chokers SPEED. Do a Grapple contest against any creature that is within 1 tile (at end of jump).
passives: **Strangle** - While a creature is Grappled by the Mossy Choker they take 5 damage at the start of their turn.
descriptor: A slime which pretends to be a patch of Moss on trees or ledges. When its prey is below it, the Mossy Choker will pounce and choke its prey to death. However, the Mossy Choker can be easily spotted as they tend to be on the bottom of branches or in direct sunlight, unlike the moss they try to mimic.

name: Groundbreaker Golem
actives: **Rock-break Claws** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 3 Damage. Bonus: Remove 3 Armor then do 3 Damage.
passives: **Tunneler** - This creature may tunnel through most natural terrains at a speed of 1 tile per turn.
descriptor: A crablike golem made of white stone with metal reinforcements. Designed for quarrying and mining this golem has been known for breaking stone

name: Golem-Brood Spider
actives:
**Slicer Talons** - Spend ##; Melee Attack, On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, activate Webs on the target.

**Webs** - Spend ##; Do a Grapple contest against a creature within 2 tiles. If the Spider wins the target is Grappled until they destroy the webs binding them. (1 Health, 1 Dodge, instant destruction when in contact with fire).

**Suffocating Binding** - Spend 1 Strain; Do 1 damage to a Grappled creature within 2 tiles of you.
passives:
**Flame Weakness** - When the Groveling gains Burn gain twice the amount.

**Web Walker** - Can climb on floors, ceilings, and Webbing as if it was normal ground.
descriptor: A giant golem in the design of a Spider. Their design all but lost to time, their original purpose unknown. What is known is that these monstrosity have a tendency to find and consume metal and flesh in order to reproduce.

name: Golem-Brood Spider Queen
actives:
**Lifedrain Talons** - Spend ##; Melee Attack with 2 Reaching, On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: Heal for the amount of damage done.

**Webs** - Spend ##; Do a Grapple contest against a creature within 2 tiles. If the Spider wins the target is Grappled until they destroy the webs binding them. (1 Health, 1 Dodge, instant destruction when in contact with fire).

**Suffocating Binding** - Spend 1 Strain; Do 1 damage to a Grappled creature within 2 tiles of you. 

**Reanimation Protocol** - Once per turn, spend ###; Revive a dead Golem-Brood Spider within 3 tiles. It revives with 4 Health and 3 Strain. This cannot activate on a Spider that died of Burn or is burning.
passives:
**Flame Weakness** - When the Spider gains Burn gain twice the amount.

**Large** - This creature is 2x2 and is immune to effects that would forcefully move it (such as Knockback).

**Web Walker** - Can climb on floors, ceilings, and Webbing as if it was normal ground.

**Mother's Wrath** - Will target the creature that did the most damage to a Golem-Brood Spider before the Queen's turn.
descriptor: A giant golem in the design of a Spider. Their design all but lost to time, their original purpose unknown. What is known is that these monstrosity have a tendency to find and consume metal and flesh in order to reproduce.

name: Golem-Brood Spider Queen (Boss)
actives:
**Lifedrain Talons** - Spend ##; Melee Attack with 2 Reaching, On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: Heal for the amount of damage done.

**Webs** - Spend ##; Do a Grapple contest against a creature within 2 tiles. If the Spider wins the target is Grappled until they destroy the webs binding them. (1 Health, 1 Dodge, instant destruction when in contact with fire).

**Suffocating Binding** - Spend 1 Strain; Do 1 damage to a Grappled creature within 2 tiles of you. 

**Reanimation Protocol** - Once per turn, spend ###; Revive a dead Golem-Brood Spider within 3 tiles. It revives with 4 Health and 3 Strain. This cannot activate on a Spider that died of Burn or is burning.
passives:
**Boss** - Roll initiative twice, gaining a turn on both rolls. (Re-roll if you get 2 of the same rolls.) At the end of their turn roll and Lock a dice. They can Lock up to 2 dice.

**Flame Weakness** - When the Spider gains Burn gain twice the amount.

**Large** - This creature is 2x2 and is immune to effects that would forcefully move it (such as Knockback).

**Vulnerable Spot** - Does not start active; When active this spot can be targeted to do double damage to the Queen. This spot has +1 Dodge (instead of -1 Dodge).

**Web Walker** - Can climb on floors, ceilings, and Webbing as if it was normal ground.

**Mother's Wrath** - Will target the creature that did the most damage to a Golem-Brood Spider before the Queen's turn.

**Evolving** - At the end of the round pick an evolution and gains a Vulnerable Spot. The Queen may only have 3 evolutions at a time and MUST replace the oldest evolution when doing so.
- Fireproof - The Queen cannot gain stacks of Burn.
- Bulletproof - The Queen cannot take damage from Ranged Attacks.
- Grow - The Queen becomes 3x3 and does +2 damage on all Actions.
- Web Cannon - The Queen can do *Webs*, *Suffocating Binding*, and *Reanimation Protocol* with +8 range.
- Soul Siphon - When a creature dies within 1 medium tile (36x36 tiles) the Queen heals 5 Health and refunds 5 Strain.
descriptor: An advanced form of Golem-Brood Spider Queen forced to evolve by unnatural causes this abomination of an abomination is more deadly than most creatures alive. Should you come across this RUN and hope it doesn't follow.

name: possesed civilian
actives: **Cutlery** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Gain +1d4 damage.
passives: **Solid Hold** - This creature cannot become Charmed.
descriptor: A simple civilian who has been taken over by another.

name: City Guard
actives: **Baton** - Spend ##; Melee Attack. On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target 1 Stun.
passives:
**To the Ground** - The Guard has +1d4 on Grapple contests, and may spend 1 Strain to force a Grappled target to go Prone.

**Person of Authority** - Civilians are more likely to listen to this character.
descriptor: Your average city guard.

name: City Guard (Ranged)
actives:
**Rifle** - Spend ##; 12 Ranged Attack; On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do 2 damage.

**Mark** - Spend #; Give a target you can see Marked until the start of your next turn.
passives:
**To the Ground** - The Guard has +1d4 on Grapple contests, and may spend 1 Strain to force a Grappled target to go Prone.

**Person of Authority** - Civilians are more likely to listen to this character.
descriptor: Your average city guard. With a Gun.
